full_threads.body:
Hi Emily,

See below Heath from our website details.

Heath Maguire heath@wpperk.com <mailto:heath@wpperk.com>

As Insurance details are always changing it may be best if you speak with him directly.

Please let me know if you need anything else.

Warm Regards,

Taylor McNeall
Executive Assistant to the
Managing Director of Accounting & Tax Advisory





CLICK HERE TO SUPPORT THE LOYAL FOUNDATION. <http://www.loyalfoundation.com.au/>

Office: 40 Lime Street, King Street Wharf Sydney NSW 2000
Postal: Boxes 9-11, 26a Lime Street, King Street Wharf Sydney NSW 2000
T: +61 2 9249 7600 | D: +61 2 9249 7647 | F: +61 2 9249 7699 | www.bellpartners.com <http://www.bellpartners.com/>
ü Please consider the environment before printing this e-mail.

Liability limited by a Scheme approved under Professional Standards Legislation.



From: Emily Bates <ebates@bellpartnersap.com>
Sent: Friday, 3 July 2020 12:02 PM
To: Taylor McNeall <tmcneall@bellpartners.com>
Subject: website updates

Hi Taylor

Sorry about all this admin, but I’ve now been told we need to include some additional links on our web page for compliance reasons, as we technically sit under Insurance House.

The page is https://www.bellpartners.com/services/insurance-business-and-personal/ <https://www.bellpartners.com/services/insurance-business-and-personal/>

The 4 links can go under the disclaimer and I’m thinking visually it will look best if they’re just appearing spaced along one justified line. This means removing the current “Click here to view our Financial Services Guide” and just replacing it with the shorter wording below (same link URL)

Financial Services Guide https://www.bellpartners.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/bell-partners-asset-protection-fsg-preparation-date-22.06.20.pdf <https://www.bellpartners.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/bell-partners-asset-protection-fsg-preparation-date-22.06.20.pdf>

Complaints https://www.bellpartners.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/bell-partners-asset-protection-fsg-preparation-date-22.06.20.pdf <https://www.bellpartners.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/bell-partners-asset-protection-fsg-preparation-date-22.06.20.pdf>

Privacy https://www.insurancehouse.com.au/privacy-policy <https://www.insurancehouse.com.au/privacy-policy>

Code of Practice https://www.insurancehouse.com.au/sites/default/files/documents/NIBA_Code_of_Practice_2014_0.pdf <https://www.insurancehouse.com.au/sites/default/files/documents/NIBA_Code_of_Practice_2014_0.pdf>

thanks
Emiliy


Emily Bates
Marketing & Business Operations

T: +61 2 9249 7600 | M: +61 412 213 454 | F: +61 2 9249 7699 | www.bellpartners.com <http://www.bellpartners.com/>
